home.title: Your toolkit to dive into C++ easily
home.easyDescription: With c3pm, start your cross-platform project with 0 configuration. It has never been so simple!
home.trivialDescription: c3pm will manage the dependencies for you! No more hours spent installing a simple library: one command and you‚Äôre good to go!
home.sharingDescription: c3pm is, before all, a package manager. You can share a reusable piece of code with the entire community!

2.title: 2 ‚Äì Site access
2.1: The site https://c3pm.io allows the User free access to the following services:
2.2: - Search and share packages containing C++ code.
2.3: - Share ("Packages"), download packages, view their documentation.
2.4: The site is accessible free of charge anywhere to any User with Internet access. All costs incurred by the User to access the service (computer hardware, software, Internet connection, etc.) are at the User's expense. The non-member User does not have access to the reserved services. To do so, they must register by filling out the form. By agreeing to register for the reserved services, the member User agrees to provide truthful and accurate information regarding his civil status and contact details, including his email address.
2.5: To access all the services, the User must then identify himself using his login and password that he determined during his registration.
2.6: Any User member who is regularly registered may also request to be removed from the list by going to the dedicated page on his personal space. This will be effective within a reasonable time. Any event due to a case of absolute necessity having for consequence a dysfunction of the site or server and subject to any interruption or modification in case of maintenance, does not engage the responsibility of https://c3pm.io. In these cases, the User agrees not to hold the editor responsible for any interruption or suspension of service, even without notice.
2.7: The User has the possibility to contact the site by email at the email address of the editor communicated in ARTICLE 1.

3.title: 3 ‚Äì Data collection

7.title: 7 ‚Äì Cookies
7.1: The User is informed that during his visits to the site, a cookie may be automatically installed on his browser.
7.2: Cookies are small files that are temporarily stored on the hard drive of the User's computer by your browser and are necessary for the use of the https://c3pm.io website. Cookies do not contain personal information and cannot be used to identify anyone. A cookie contains a unique identifier, randomly generated and therefore anonymous. Some cookies expire at the end of the User's visit, others remain.
7.3: The information contained in the cookies is used to improve the site https://c3pm.io and by browsing the site, the User accepts them.
7.4: However, the User must give his consent to the use of certain cookies. In the absence of acceptance, the User is informed that certain functionalities or pages may be refused.
7.5: The User may deactivate these cookies by using the settings in his or her browser software.

Any legal action taken by an injured third party against the site will be borne by the User. The User's content may be removed or modified by the site at any time and for any reason, without notice.
